mapper.insert: insert into ta_diner(score, title, description, img_url, address, user_id,comment_num) VALUES (#{score},#{title},#{description},#{imgUrl},#{address},#{userId},#{commentNum})
mapper.select: select * from ta_diner where title like concat('%',#{word},'%')
mapper.update: update ta_diner set score=#{score},comment_num=#{commentNum} where diner_id=#{dinerId}
